recipes.title: Matzo Ball Soup
recipes.summary: A classic Jewish-Polish dish featuring fluffy matzo balls in a savory broth. Perfect for any occasion.

recipes.title: Potato Latkes
recipes.summary: Crispy potato pancakes, a traditional Jewish-Polish delicacy served with applesauce or sour cream.

recipes.title: Beef Brisket
recipes.summary: Slow-cooked tender beef brisket, a hearty Jewish-Polish favorite often served during holidays and celebrations.
